description:
They don't believe in compromising your style to stay warm, which is why this street-worthy jacket was engineered for warmth and looks.

They started out with a shirt-style collar to give it an urban feel, then they added in just enough insulation to keep you toasty when the wind picks up but without going full mountain-style bulk. After that, they made sure it had enough eco-friendly water resistance to withstand that passing rain shower. The result? A clean, low-profile uber-stylish jacket that withstands the elements while working perfectly for your morning commute.
name: Prana Pinchot Shirt Jacket - Mens
